thread.section_title: Classificações sobre a FaroAirportTransfersTO | Comentários de clientes da FaroAirportTransfersTO | faroairporttransfersto.com
thread.title: Michele

author: Michele
title: Michele
text: We have used this transfer company many times and always on time, polite efficient drivers. Our driver David asked have you got everything and we checked the car. Bed time for my five year old and her comfort soft bunny was missing! A quick call and bunny was found hidden in the side pocket in the car. Lovely David drove over an hour to bring bunny back and late evening to reunite bunny and my daughter . He saved the day! So kind the whole team going out of their way to help.
